casebody.data:
Alphonso T. PITTS, Appellant(s)/Petitioner(s),
v.
The STATE of Florida, Appellee(s)/Respondent(s), CASE NO.: 3D18-1798 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. SEPTEMBER 27, 2018 SUAREZ, FERNANDEZ and SCALES, JJ., concur.

Following review of the petition for writ of mandamus and the response thereto, it is ordered that said petition is hereby denied.
